import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import Axios from "axios" export default function LoginPage() { const [userx, setUserX] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { getUser(); }, []); const getUser = async () => { const res = await Axios.get("http://localhost:3001/api/login"); if (res.data.loggedIn === true) { setUserX(res.data.user[0].username); console.log(res.data.user[0].username); } }; return (

Hoşgeldin {userx} Yeni Üye
